default: ^This is the default knot, we should not be reading this in game
a: ^Good day to you, I brought you quite the rare artifact today, please take a look
^I believe stroking this object with a cloth will grant you wishes.. It has the potential to be quite popular at auctions, I believe !
b: ^Thank you for this offer.. I hope this will bring about good fortune to your shop..
c: ^I'm sorry, I would rather sell it at a higher price..
d: ^Your wallet seems a little empty, doesn't it ..?
